name: live Mince
description: Show who is in charge in this zombie saturated place! Destroy the crowds of the undead, constantly looking for a new victim. Destroy the source of infection to save humanity.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce 9600 gt DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1300 MB available space
